src/main.js.summary: CLI tool for indexing project files and executing tasks using prompts, leveraging OpenAI for code analysis and modification.

TASKS.md.summary: Defines a system to index codebases for LLM-assisted tasks (documentation, review, code generation) by creating structured metadata and processing user prompts to select relevant files.

package.json.summary: Configures a Node.js CLI tool for interacting with LLMs using LangChain and OpenAI, including command-line handling and environment management.

package-lock.json.summary: Manages Node.js project dependencies for a CLI tool integrating AI language models via LangChain and OpenAI.

prompts/summarize-file.md.summary: Provides instructions for generating JSON metadata to summarize code files for code search purposes.

prompts/main-execute.md.summary: Couldn't generate summary. CHECK file based on it's name.

prompts/get-required-files.md.summary: Defines a system prompt that determines required files for completing a task based on available project files and returns them as a JSON array.

prompts/generate-doc.md.summary: Provides a template for generating JSDoc-style documentation comments, including parameter descriptions, return types, and usage examples.
